rows.label: qst711101_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey!
I'm Isabella, don'cha know!

rows.label: qst711101_msg0002
rows.name:
I'm something of an adventurer around
these parts.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0003
rows.name:
Say, do you know about
the Barney Stones?

rows.label: qst711101_msg0004
rows.name:
Long, long ago, a famed adventurer
called Blue Barney went adventuring
for treasure in Alst.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0005
rows.name:
But during his travels in Iira, he
collected so much loot he couldn't
carry it all...

rows.label: qst711101_msg0006
rows.name:
So he decided to seal it up inside
big rocks and got monsters to guard it
to make sure it didn't get stolen.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0007
rows.name:
He thought he'd retrieve his loot when
he next made it out to Torna, you see.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0008
rows.name: But he never got the chance...

rows.label: qst711101_msg0009
rows.name:
And so the Barney Stones remain
untouched to this day...

rows.label: qst711101_msg0010
rows.name:
Barney might have been a bit useless,
and a good-for-nothing, but it makes
for an interesting tale, right?

rows.label: qst711101_msg0011
rows.name: Did you enjoy the Barney Stone story?

rows.label: qst711101_msg0012
rows.name: Yeah!

rows.label: qst711101_msg0013
rows.name: Yawn...

rows.label: qst711101_msg0014
rows.name:
So you agree? I'm so glad to
have met a like-minded soul!

rows.label: qst711101_msg0015
rows.name:
Then have I got another
tale for you!

rows.label: qst711101_msg0016
rows.name:
I've heard there's a Barney Stone
somewhere in the nearby Haradd Hills.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0017
rows.name:
Thought I might have a go at finding
it myself, but so far no luck...

rows.label: qst711101_msg0018
rows.name:
Now I'm thinking I might just pack up
and head back to the capital.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0019
rows.name:
But you look like you might
be able to find it.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0020
rows.name:
When you do find it, you're supposed
to hold your hands up and chant,
"Barney's the Man" three times!

rows.label: qst711101_msg0021
rows.name:
Yeah...
I know, I know... I think it's nuts too.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0022
rows.name:
You've got to say the words to break
the seal, but you can probably just
mutter it under your breath.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0023
rows.name:
Oh, and you'll have to take care
of all the monsters that show up
after you break the seal.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0024
rows.name:
If you can manage that, Barney's
hidden loot will be all yours, and
it'll finally reenter circulation.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0025
rows.name:
On the off-chance you do manage
to get the treasure, let me know.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0026
rows.name:
I'm sure it'll be an exciting
tale you'll have to tell me.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0027
rows.name: Until then, I suppose...

rows.label: qst711101_msg0102
rows.name: Fair enough...

rows.label: qst711101_msg0103
rows.name: That's the end of this tale for you then.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0201
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: qst711101_msg0202
rows.name:
You haven't actually gone and found
it, have you? The Barney Stone? And
the treasure?

rows.label: qst711101_msg0203
rows.name: Then tell me all the juicy details!

rows.label: qst711101_msg0204
rows.name:
I knew you had it in you!
Didn't I say it?

rows.label: qst711101_msg0205
rows.name:
So what do you think? Do you think
you'll become adventurers now and
make a killing?

rows.label: qst711101_msg0206
rows.name:
There's a legend about a stash of
buried gold in Iira's vast desert...

rows.label: qst711101_msg0207
rows.name:
If I join forces with you, I reckon
we could make a tidy profit.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0208
rows.name: ...Just kidding!

rows.label: qst711101_msg0209
rows.name:
Last thing I need in my line of work
is more tough competition!

rows.label: qst711101_msg0210
rows.name:
Well, thanks very much for
listening to my waffle!

rows.label: qst711101_msg0211
rows.name:
I hear there are other Barney Stones
scattered around Iira, so good luck
with those!

rows.label: qst711101_msg0311
rows.name:
I've heard there's a Barney Stone
up on the Haradd Hills near here.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0312
rows.name:
When you do find it, you're supposed
to hold your hands up and chant,
"Barney's the Man" three times!

rows.label: qst711101_msg0313
rows.name:
Then you have to take care of
all the monsters that show up
after you break the seal.

rows.label: qst711101_msg0314
rows.name:
Come back and tell me the tale
once you've got the loot, OK?
